name: BadgeMe
0:
”Alexa, ask Badge Me to give me a nickname.”
”Alexa, ask Badge Me to give me another nickname.”
”Alexa, ask Badge Me to nickname me.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: badge me
des: Tired of having the same old name day in and day out while other people with hip sounding names reap all the rewards. Well, not anymore! Ask "Badge Me" for a nickname and see how your life changes. Get more friends. Make more money. Have more sex. Achieve world domination. Give it a try!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
